noAvailability.description: Add availability so students can book lessons in your calendar.

guide.availableSlot: Yellow slots can be booked by students
guide.blockedSlot: Gray slots are blocked (cannot be booked)
guide.bookedLesson: Green slots already have a booked lesson
guide.checkboxAvailability: “Availability” checkbox shows or hides open slots (yellow blocks)
guide.checkboxLessons: “Lessons” checkbox shows or hides booked lessons (green blocks)
guide.createSlotDesc: Click the blue “+ Add slot” button at the top of the calendar. In the dialog choose the date plus start and end time (use arrows to change weeks). Press “Save” when everything is filled.
guide.editSlotDesc: Hover a yellow slot to see the edit (pencil) and delete icons. Use the pencil to change the hours or the trash to remove the slot entirely.
guide.helpIconDesc: Click the question mark at any time to reopen this guide.
guide.howToEdit: How to edit or delete a slot
guide.intro: The calendar helps you manage when students can book lessons. Create, edit, or delete slots whenever you need.
guide.maxDuration: Maximum slot duration is 3 hours (180 minutes)
guide.navigationDesc: Use the left/right arrows to switch weeks. “Today” jumps to the current week, “Go to first free slot” scrolls to the nearest open time.
guide.noDuplicates: You cannot create two slots for the same time — the system prevents conflicts automatically.
guide.noOverlap: Slots cannot overlap with booked lessons or other slots.
guide.setupButtonDesc: Opens the availability template where you can define a recurring schedule (e.g. Mondays 9:00–12:00) and auto-generate slots.
guide.title: How to use the tutor calendar

guide.createSlotDesc: Click "Add slot" or drag on the grid to create availability for students.

guide.intro: Everything you need to know to manage availability and lessons in one place.
guide.maxDuration: Slots longer than 3 hours may be split for better visibility.
guide.navigationDesc: Use arrows or keyboard shortcuts to move between weeks. "Today" jumps back to the current week.
guide.noDuplicates: Avoid duplicate overlapping slots to keep booking simple.
guide.noOverlap: Overlapping lessons and availability are blocked automatically.
guide.setupButtonDesc: "Set booking hours" opens the availability editor for full schedule control.
